title: Redistribution of charge between identical spheres

content.question: A small metal sphere X is charged by losing 500 electrons. An identical metal sphere Y is charged by gaining 1000 electrons. The two spheres are first put in contact with each other and then separated. If -e is the charge on an electron, what is the charge on each sphere after separation?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
